EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CTO_4_Business_eBook
EmailTemplate.subject: There IS a way to boost revenues and cut costs simultaneously!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Three keys to a more profitable network As CTO, ensuring your company’s network is both cost-effective and profitable is an important part of your job. Discover how Secure Service Enablement from Nokia can help you boost revenue and cut costs by reading our new eBook, which discusses how to:
- Protect roaming revenues
- Minimize off-network costs
- Attract customers and prevent churn Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
